MP4TrackId MP4EncryptTrack (  MP4FileHandle  srcFile,
MP4TrackId  srcTrackId,
IMPEG4SinfDRMEncryptor *  encryptor,
MP4FileHandle  dstFile,
MP4TrackId  dstTrackId,
bool  applyEdits
) 
 

Protect track using given encryptor.

Read all the samples from the track and protect them using given encryptor. When it's done, add DRM information to IMP4SinfAtom.

Parameters:
srcFile input, source file handle.
srcTrackId input, source file track identifier.
encryptor input, DRM encryptor.
dstFile input, destination file handle.
dstTrackId input, destination file track identifier.
applyEdits input, apply edits flag.
Returns:
If failed MP4_INVALID_TRACK_ID, otherwise != MP4_INVALID_TRACK_ID.

MP4TrackId EncryptTrack (  const char *  xmlFileName,
const std::vector< const char * > &  sensitive,
const char *  drmEncMethod,
MP4FileHandle  srcFile,
MP4TrackId  srcTrackId,
const char *  fName,
MP4FileHandle  dstFile,
bool  applyEdits,
MP4TrackId  dstHintTrackReferenceTrack
) 
 

Protect track.

Given a source track in a source file, make an encrypted copy of the track in the destination file, including sample encryption.

Parameters:
xmlFileName input, XML configuration file name.
sensitive input, sensitive data.
drmEncMethod input, DRM and encryption method.
srcFile input, source file handle.
srcTrackId input, source file track identifier.
fName input, name of the source mp4 file to be protected.
dstFile input, destination file handle.
applyEdits input, apply edits flag.
dstHintTrackReferenceTrack input, destination hint reference track identifier.
Returns:
If failed MP4_INVALID_TRACK_ID, otherwise != MP4_INVALID_TRACK_ID.
